name: cdeqel
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

stmt.origin: cdeqi(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

stmt.origin: eleq12d(c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
stmt.pretty: eleq12d(c0, c1, c2, c3, s0 = s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (s0 = s1 → c0 = c2)
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 → c0 = c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c3))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ c2 ∈ c3))
⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c3)
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 → c0 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c3))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(c1, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c3)
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 → c1 = c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(c1, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(c0 ∈ c1 ↔ c2 ∈ c3))
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 → c0 = c2)
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 → c1 = c3)

comment: Distribute conditional equality over elementhood. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
